blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.author: mario
blogs.body: Hello World! This is my first blog post. I hope you like it! We are going to have a lot of fun learning to code! I am so excited to be a part of this community! I am going to be posting a lot of cool stuff, so stay tuned!

blogs.title: Opening Party!
blogs.author: yoshi
blogs.body: The party is going to be lit! We are going to have a lot of fun! I can't wait to see you all there! It's going to be a blast! What are you most excited about? I am most excited about the food! I love food! I am going to eat so much! I can't wait to see you all there!
